meanings.definition: Spend time aimlessly or to waste time.
meanings.sent1: Stop lollygagging and finish your homework.
meanings.sent2: She was lollygagging around instead of cleaning her room.
meanings.sent3: The cat was lollygagging in the sun, ignoring the mice.
meanings.sent4: The clouds were lollygagging across the sky, delaying the sunset.
meanings.sent5: The students were lollygagging in the hallway, causing a traffic jam.
